divs: Sighting Detailsone the last night of moving big furniture into a new home, me and my daughter took a little break on the front porch, my wife was in the bathroom, me and my daughter was talking about the new home when out of our left side of vision we see this moon shaped object, same color,but brighter, (about half of a half the size of the real moon i'd guestimate) we watch as this object "play danced " VERY low in the sky, by our vision it looked about around the height as the power lines, so its flyin,then it dead stops, dissapearing, reapears, dissapearing, reapears , and starts dancing again, it does that for about 15-20 sec and stops, dissapears and never reapears again. we didn't say a word for a couple of minutes, and while this is goin, my wife was in the bathroom, missed the whole thing, but me and my 7yr old daughter seen the whole thing!
trends: There have been 45 other sightings in Grand Rapids
There were no other sightings in Grand Rapids on or around August 1st 2008
